name: Dragon's Feast
description:
Arrow Keys to move up/down and left/right, Space Bar to FEAST!

Enjoy my second ever GameJam submission. Comment on what you liked, what you think could be improved, etc. 

Post Mortem(For those interested):

Pro's

-Improved programming with Random Arrays for creating enemy pathing

-First time with particle effects/blood splatter turned out well

-Silly but effective sound effects created by my vocals in GarageBand 

-Overall decent game mechanics

Could be Improved

-With more time would have liked to have added enemies that could throw items to damage the dragon

-different enemy sprites

-items for humans to hide behind (Think trees, rocks) in the environment where the dragon is unable to get to

-Simple Story elements to improve user experience.

Overall happy with submission and hope you guys enjoy!  Could have maybe gotten a few more elements in if not for Father's day and the Last of Us 2 :)
